ai_answer: A mushroom which was magically turned into a mosquito.
ai_explanation:
To explain how the AI made that decision we looked for past answers to questions close to yours:
  • Case #1 (“What form did Brom’s bride take after Serpentus’s spell?”): In that earlier interaction, the AI confronted the identical excerpt and answered “a mushroom.”
  • Case #2 (“Did Brom end up marrying the mosquito or something else?”): Here too, the AI answered “the mushroom.”
